name: Silly Vampire Run 3D
description:
Welcome to the new game Silly Vampire Run 3D. A new HD graphics game.

Welcome to Silly Vampire Run 3D :P

You can help the silly vampire to collect many coins and overcome obstacles. The little goofy ahh vampire with its super jumps.  Run into the night with the silly vampire on the streets of old silly London, avoiding obstacles, buses and subways. Retrieve a good number of coins. Do not give up at the first difficulty the silly vampire is never tired. Soon new new characters. Download it today Silly Vampire Run 3D is completely free. The controls are simple and intuitive thanks to touch-based controls. Nice and fun game mechanics. Challenge your friends to who get the highest score :P
